dcterms:description: A dataset for intrusion detection composed by performing penetration testing on SPaCe, an embedded cyber-physical system built over Robot Operating System 2 (ROS2). The dataset includes sequences of normal operations and sequences when attacks are carried out, allowing for the measurement of detection latency.
dcterms:title: ROSpace

dcterms:creator: Tommaso Zoppi
Andrea Ceccarelli
dcterms:description: An embedded system for Internet of Things applications that provides data about how the Arancino device behaves in case of anomalies due to different injected errors. The dataset includes sequences of normal operations and sequences with injected errors, allowing for the measurement of error detection latency.
dcterms:title: Arancino
